picked_headlines.summary: ZeroQAT offers efficient quantization-aware training of LLMs, reducing memory while maintaining accuracy.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article introduces a novel framework that has significant implications for both engineering and management by optimizing resource usage without compromising performance.

picked_headlines.summary: A power engineer built an AI agent system using no-code tools, showcasing AI's practical applications in crypto management.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This post highlights a practical application of AI in a real-world scenario, appealing to both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in innovative solutions.

digest:
- *PiERN* integrates high-precision computation into LLMs via token-level routing, improving accuracy and efficiency: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.18169
- *Tequila* optimizes ternary quantization for LLMs, enhancing performance by overcoming deadzone trapping: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.23809
- *Optuna vs Code Llama* explores using LLMs for hyperparameter tuning, showing they can outperform traditional methods: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06006
- *GradES* accelerates transformer training by using gradient-based early stopping, improving speed and accuracy: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.01842
- *KaLM-Embedding-V2* introduces advanced training techniques, achieving state-of-the-art performance in compact embedding models: https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.20923
- *Green Learning for STAR-RIS mmWave Systems* proposes a framework enhancing efficiency without explicit CSI: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.06820
- *AnesSuite* introduces a specialized dataset for anesthesiology reasoning in LLMs, enhancing medical applications: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02404
- *EditGRPO* enhances chest X-ray report generation using RL with clinical rewards, outperforming existing models: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.22812
- *FedAgentBench* proposes an agent-driven framework for automating federated learning in healthcare: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.23803
- *G-reasoner* integrates graph and language models for improved reasoning over graph-structured knowledge: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.24276
